summary: This document is an email correspondence between Paul Morris and Chip Packard discussing financial matters related to Epstein. It indicates that Epstein is sending over a significant amount of money, suggesting ongoing financial transactions. The email reflects internal communications within Deutsche Bank regarding their dealings with Epstein.
